adrFormatAddress: 395 South End Ave Unit 32B, New York, NY 10280, USA

originalText.text:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I recently had the pleasure of working with Stage and Fold, and I cannot express how impressed I am with their innovative approach to apartment staging. As someone in the real estate industry, finding cost-effective solutions without compromising quality is crucial, and Stage and Fold exceeded my expectations.

Their alternative to traditional apartment staging is a game-changer. Not only do they offer a fresh and modern aesthetic, but they do so at a fraction of the price compared to traditional staging services. The foldable and customizable furniture they use is not only stylish but also functional, allowing for a quick and hassle-free setup.

The team at Stage and Fold is incredibly professional and attentive to detail. From the initial consultation to the final setup, their commitment to excellence is evident. They understood my specific needs and preferences, delivering a staging that perfectly complemented the space and appealed to potential buyers.

What sets Stage and Fold apart is their commitment to affordability without compromising on quality or style. In an industry where presentation is key, they provide a cost-effective solution that doesn't sacrifice aesthetic appeal. This makes them a valuable partner for real estate professionals looking to enhance property showings without breaking the bank.

I highly recommend Stage and Fold to anyone in the real estate business or individuals looking to sell their homes. Their alternative staging solution is a breath of fresh air, and I will undoubtedly be using their services for future listings. Thank you, Fold and Stage, for revolutionizing the world of apartment staging! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

originalText.text: As a Broker, this is an amazing combination of a strong result/affordable solution to stage units. It's so powerful for possible tenants to be able to visualize their future apartment.  I strongly recommend Stage & Fold.  They are responsive, affordable, reliable and a benefit for any broker.  Thanks Sahar & Dave!!!

I strongly recommend Stage & Fold.  They are responsive, affordable, reliable and a benefit for any broker.  Thanks Sahar & Dave!!!

originalText.text:
I’m a local developer in Brooklyn.  We just used them for our new rental building.
The staging was great! Saved us a lot of money on staging and helped move the building fast.  Great service and a great solution for the industry!
Definitely recommended

originalText.text: This is the second time we have used Stage N Fold's services to stage an apartment in Manhattan, NY and we could not be happier! We see a positive difference in buyers' responses and eventually interest/offers when we use this company vs. showing an empty apartment. The service is quick, professional, and always courteous. It is a great budget option - we will definitely be returning!

We see a positive difference in buyers' responses and eventually interest/offers when we use this company vs. showing an empty apartment. The service is quick, professional, and always courteous. It is a great budget option - we will definitely be returning!

originalText.text: 5 stars!! I got an accepted offer over asking price on my 1 bedroom condo in the Bronx the same day I use stage and fold staging services! The owners Sahar and Dave make it easy and are wonderful to work with!!!
